objects.text: Studio Quality Sound • Ultimate Comfort • Foldable Design
DON'T MISS OUT! LIMITED TIME OFFER

product_details.name: Premium Over-Ear Headphones - Studio Quality Sound & Ultimate Comfort
product_details.description:
• Professional-grade over-ear design for superior sound isolation
• Plush memory foam ear cushions for extended listening comfort
• Durable padded headband with adjustable fit
• High-quality wired connection for stable audio transmission
• Foldable design for easy storage and portability
• Deep bass response with balanced audio spectrum
• Sleek matte black finish for professional appearance
• Ergonomically designed ear cups for optimal sound delivery
• Heavy-duty cable for lasting durability
• Perfect for studio monitoring, gaming, and everyday music enjoyment

banner_details:
This banner presents a visually striking promotional layout with a central emphasis on a featured product image (`product_image`), which is a pair of premium over-ear headphones. The composition is vertically aligned, starting with a powerful main headline (`heading`) at the top in bold orange, followed by a white subheading (`subheading`) and a short product descriptor (`product_title`).

The visual hierarchy is extended by showcasing key selling points in a text layer (`features`) beneath the product, drawing attention to sound quality and comfort. A strong call-to-action area is situated at the bottom, with pricing (`price`) in large orange font, emphasized urgency (`urgency_text`) in white, and a rectangular orange button (`cta_button_background`) with contrasting call-to-action text (`cta`) in deep purple. The background SVG includes a purple gradient overlay, radial light effects, wave accents, and orange square motifs on corners, adding depth and digital flair.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Purple: `#3A1078`
- Medium Purple: `#4E31AA`
- Accent Orange: `#FF9F29`
- Soft Violet Lines: `#6357CC`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases sleek, over-ear headphones designed with a minimalist monochrome palette dominated by deep charcoal and soft graphite shades. Key colors include Matte Black (#1C1C1C), Gunmetal Gray (#2F2F2F), and Industrial Silver (#A9A9A9). These tones are expertly blended through smooth transitions in the headband and earcups, while polished metallic elements subtly highlight the contours. The use of shadows and reflective accents enhances depth and sophistication. For an ad banner, combine these grayscale hues with a pop color like Electric Blue (#007BFF) or Signal Red (#FF3D3D) to create contrast and draw attention effectively while preserving the product’s premium aesthetic.
